ygData.subject: Re: Reminder
ygData.msgSnippet: A good point!  I was level 35.  Since then I have had the chance to play EQ ALOT and made level 38  (died and at 37 now). Fflewduer Fflamson 37(couple of kills
ygData.messageBody:
A good point! I was level 35. Since then I have had the chance to play EQ
ALOT and made level 38 (died and at 37 now).

Fflewduer Fflamson 37(couple of kills to get song back)song bard
Cazic Thule


>
> I just want to remind people to remember to put their level in posts
>where they talk about particular locales, etc. When you say "Place X gives
>good experience" the information is basically meaningless if we don't know
>your level...
>
>Thanks
>
>Slyde
>Level 31
